Reviews.Title: “31/03/2012”

Reviews.Content: booked dec trip tue arrived hotel told hotel repair booked 4star hotel 1 found lied doubled booked double bed pushed wall window bedside cabinet beds glass top slid top cabinet unsafe bracket ac controls wall light exposed nuts screws covered pedal bin bathroom broken told 3 phones calls 2 pillows pigeons nesting outside window building despite covered plastic wire stop loose electrical wire swinging top hotel windy hitting windy reported 4star hotel push 3star advise people hotel

Reviews.Title: “Location location location!”
Reviews.Author: wizards35
Reviews.Content: wife stayed carlton month loved picked hotel price location werent wrong dont bad reviews bad staff comments hotel looks brand inside stayed hyatt jersey staff friendly help recommendations dining restaurants ate awesome views beautiful city hope am spelling wrong forgive kaan staff cant thank

Reviews.Title: “I'd book a better hotel next time”
Reviews.Author: ashishvb
Reviews.Content: looks deceptive true carlton hotel lobby impressive enter shoddily maintained hotel bathroom unbelievable air conditioning noisy stopped 15 summer temperature didnt help booked hotel via travel agent checking reviews finalizing real nono

Reviews.Title: “Will post pics of it so all can see how bad it is !!! Avoid this HOLE !!!”
Reviews.Author: hujzkurwamimasonami
Reviews.Content: horrible spent night week ago oct 2011 step floor socks carpet seen grime fighters 4 stars lord maybe monkey wall window mould fungus covered complete shock slept smell fungus dont hotel recommend enemy steer miles rotten mouldy smelly hole 50 euro somewere else lot istanbul heaven compared juice course read feedback avoided paying 10 euro 2 glasses aware probably top iceberg whats kitchen pictures avoid cost

Reviews.Title: “Carlton Hotel, Istanbul, chosen by Pacha Tours, is Terrible”
Reviews.Author: KMcDon
Reviews.Content: tours arranged fabulous tour pretty bad hotels spent days 24 day tour turkey dirty tiny gold carpet black dirt afraid barefoot bathroom door hit toilet maneuver door wall shower door close toilet half tub cracked dirty difficult manage step tub shower final day yesterday water brown board sponge baths sink complained local tour company engaged guest relations guy indifferent

Reviews.Title: “This hotel cheats you!”
Reviews.Author: Didde P
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel carlton 4 night recommend hotel basically cheat unfortunately 1 hotel fitness center write homepage 2 touch minibar charged taking items final bill complained refused change charged breakfast adding refused change 3 charged credit card chance bill difficult 3 receipt turkish difficult actually charging 4 2 nights hotel extremely cold bring jacket breakfast 2 times extra blanket

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, but just so hot in the hotel.”
Reviews.Author: TravellingBoys
Reviews.Content: minutes walk road tram stop tram stops main tourist attractions blue mosque grand bazaar etc nice reception bar breakfast none airconditioned istanbul august wasnt nice breakfast warm warm milk warm fruit warm meats cheese etc pleasant diy urgently fix carpet paint walls fix fridge etc self disappointing

Reviews.Title: “This is the worse experience I have ever had”
Reviews.Author: trekking-Georgia
Reviews.Content: found booked carlton hotel lastminutecom photos looked medium level hotel beds looked normal clarify location location noted map street address map arrived appeared laleli market palace shops traders stay sultanahmed touristic center called lastminutecom location answered center fine ok double bad move thanks god clean shower space enter soap offered shampoo hand body wash conditioner blowing directly head tv bed watch normaly internet connection appeared lobby web site noted help reception disturb hour forgot thanks god stayd 4 nights couse complained manager helped found internet cafe trip istanbul stayed hostels hotels ordinary 34 star hotels horrible experience careful book hotel please check carefully

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!!”
Reviews.Author: BasakLondon
Reviews.Content: stayed carlton hotel february 2010 week turkey half term holiday am student london aged 27 visiting feb 2010 visiting friend stayed therebut hotel beautiful completely am satisfied hygiene hotels location close airport historical helpful cheerful staffi am looking forward summer

Reviews.Title: “more a 2 star than a 4 star”
Reviews.Author: Mummymuz
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights march 2010 hotel spotlessly clean bathroom freezing cold mobility little real using shower breakfast ok 5 lire orange juice terrible fresh fruit nicer 5 kinds feta cheese terms location excellent easy walking distance tram airport cheap eateries nearby corner shop selling drinks etc normal prices central hotel head whilst city break 4 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “very nice place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: shakir222
Reviews.Content: time service easy location wise clean nice size customer service stay anytime traveled world enjoyed stay people nice care friends
